name: Richard Crowell
description: I can say that I am a very sociable, kind and cheerful person with a good sense of humor. I like to laugh and to have fun! Besides, people who laugh, live longer. Though, on the other hand I can be very serious. I am a reliable, responsible person. I am open to anyone and I like to help them in any hard situations. I am honest and sincere. I hate lies and I prefer to tell the truth and just what I have on my mind! Besides, I can say that I am attentive, caring, tender and sensitive man
